comment.body: altering some bits and endup with the same hash is a thing. but doing it while keeping the soft functional is nearly impossible.

regardless of if it technically possible, the use if IPSF inject a dependency to IPFS. IPFS use openDHT wich consume ~15kbps of bandwith at idle, so it pose a problem for people outiside cities of rich countries.  (witch is most of people) wich is the main reason why I use Zeronet over IPFS even tho I prefer IPFS naming structures.
